channel.title: [help] why cant i connect?!
channel.description:
okay, i have no-ip open on and updated. and my server is compiled and running. but i stillcant connect, i want it to be a Hamachi server until i can portfoward. but, why cant i connect? i dont have to port foward? do i?
Also, can any1 help me with port fowarding and finding my default gateway? is there any other way to find it? i run cmd and type ipconfig and hit ener on it and it gives me an error. it sued to work, but now it doesnt. so i cant find my default gateway. waht do i do? BTW, my router is netgear and my wireless internet thing(thign that goes into USB and gives me internet) is a belkin. cna u do anything with taht information?!?

item.title: [help] why cant i connect?!
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

Well lets get him past one part before trying to start another.
Alpha,
If you have a server running on port 43594.
Go to www.moparisthebest.com
Just type in a username and password.
Leave the “server:” part BLANK.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] why cant i connect?!
item.dc:creator: @Schmidty04 Schmidty04
item.description:
@Schmidty04 wrote:

Basically his question turned into how do i port-forward…so we said he needed his default i.p to get to his router. When he said the pass and username weren’t both “admin” therefore stated it was changed -.-

Read full topic

item.title: [help] why cant i connect?!
item.dc:creator: @RuneRemix RuneRemix
item.description:
@RuneRemix wrote:

------listen up--------

Answer his question people or dont post.

No, you do not need to portforward to connect to your own computer.
No, you do not need an ip to connect to your own computer.
No, you do not need to mess with your router to connect to YOUR OWN COMPUTER.

JEEBUS HELP US

Read full topic
